categories: Category:Imperial I-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Stormhawk was an Imperial I-class Star Destroyer.
At some point prior to the Battle of Endor, the Stormhawk was seen undergoing weapons testing at the Imperial Academy at Carida.

It was a part of Grand Admiral Thrawn's personal armada during Thrawn's campaign against the New Republic some five years after the Battle of Endor (9 ABY). Stormhawk participated at the Battle of Sluis Van in a failed attempt to capture unoccupied New Republic vessels. It would later serve as back up for the Chimaera during the assault on the Ukio system, where it was tasked with launching a pair of Carrack-class cruisers equipped with a functioning cloaking device that would serve as the key elements in the assault. Stormhawk last appeared at the Battle of Bilbringi.
